about_the_game:
Cyber Tamer is a life simulation game that brings a different perspective to the Cyberpunk universe and you have to manage time and money effectively.

The Mystery of Our Family's Death


The only thing we know about our family's demise is a baby Cybermon! Your main goal is to reveal the truth about your family's death by strengthening your bond with Cybermon. So, in this dystopian world, among the banality of death, will you be able to solve this mystery?

Time and Economy Management


Time moves in the game only as you do things that will waste your energy. Since you have the control of Cybermon as well as your own character, making money by using the time of two characters, training to prepare for fights, improving your skills by learning and refreshing your energy by sleeping are among the things you need to balance. Can you build your strategy well in this game about the life of the Cybermon trainer?

What is Cybermon?


In this dystopian world inhabited by creatures called Cybermon, the integration of humans with mechanics is prohibited by the state. Even if there are cyberpsychics who break this rule, the Cybermons in this universe are the main companions of their trainers, their soulmates. If you connect with Cybermon once in this universe, you have sworn a lifetime technological allegiance. You both need to support each other in tough times.

Become a Master Cybermon Trainer


Will you be able to join the three master trainers in the region? Develop your unique style among trainers as agile as a lizard, as strong as a bull or as sharp as a hawk! Participate in tournaments, try to win and put all your strength into becoming one of the famous trainers of the region!

Develop, Learn and Win!


Your Cybermon is dying to evolve, what about you? You can develop both your main character and your Cybermon in the game. Everything you spend time on will diversify your gameplay and make it even easier for you to balance mind, body and soul!

Are you ready?!


  • Unleash your minds by evolving your Cybermon!
  • Learn together, evolve and fight against powerful enemies!
  • Try to survive by making new friends and enemies!
  • And unlock the secrets of the past with your only friend in this world!




But are you ready to be the best Cybermon trainer in the world by using your time strategically?

content_descriptors.notes: Cyber Tamer contains mild strong language, mild violence, illegal substance use and organizing, as well as nudity and sexual material.
